hero.title: Master the Game. Master Your Mind.
hero.subtitle: Join our international chess academy and unlock your potential with the world's top online coaches.

why.title: Why Learn Chess With Us?
why.descAnalytics: Develop critical thinking and foresight. Learn to analyze complex positions, calculate variations, and make informed decisions under pressure.
why.descMemory: Strengthen your memory by memorizing openings, tactical patterns, and endgame theory. Chess is a fantastic workout for your brain.
why.descSpirit: Cultivate discipline, patience, and resilience. Learn to win with grace and lose with dignity, respecting your opponent and the game.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse profiles of our certified coaches. Read reviews and find the perfect mentor for your skill level and goals.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Use our flexible scheduling system to book a lesson at a time that works for you. We have coaches in every time zone.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Connect with your coach via our interactive online classroom, complete with video chat and a digital chessboard.

formats.title: Learning Formats
formats.descIndividual: Get undivided attention with a curriculum tailored to your personal strengths, weaknesses, and learning pace.
formats.descGroup: Join a vibrant community of fellow learners. Practice, compete, and grow together in a collaborative environment.
